name: Blake

topics.response_text: If you're looking to buy or sell, you've come to the right man. The Crimson Caravan Company has the widest selection in the wasteland.

topics.topic_text: Show me what you have for sale.
Contreras sent me for some medical supplies.
topics.response_text: Here you go. Let him know he needs to make another payment if he wants more of this stuff.

topics.topic_text: Is there something special about these supplies?
topics.response_text: Well, pain-killers are easy to come by, but it isn't easy finding iodine, allergy meds, and a few of these other items. Why do you ask?

topics.topic_text: Combining those with chemical cleaners would yield strong chems...
topics.response_text: Really?  Huh, never thought of that.  The Crimson Caravan isn't really in the drug business.

topics.topic_text: Some of those could be combined with other chemicals to make drugs...
topics.response_text: Really?  Huh, never thought of that.  The Crimson Caravan isn't really in the drug business.

topics.topic_text: McCarran needs a regular shipment of brahmin meat and spices for the mess hall.
topics.response_text: Won't be a problem. We have plenty of spice traders working with us back home, and we could get meat from local Brahmin ranchers.

topics.topic_text: McCarran has plenty of caps to cover the shipment. They'll deal with the cost.
topics.response_text: Excellent.  We should be able to get the shipments started in about a week.

topics.topic_text: Give them a deal on the price, you'll have the upper hand in future, more important negotiations.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Well, the Far Go Traders have been trying to edge us out on the new armor contract for the troops. This could swing things in our favor.

topics.topic_text: McCarran is overstocked with water and fresh vegetables. Arrange for a two for one trade.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] That should work. We'll do a weighted exchanged based on the going value of meat and vegetables. Water is invaluable in this dusty hole.

topics.topic_text: Can you answer some questions for me?
topics.response_text: Maybe. What do you want to know?

topics.topic_text: Where does the Crimson Caravan Company get its merchandise?
topics.response_text: Trade routes, my friend, trade routes. Just about every major town in the wasteland has a Crimson Caravan branch in it.

topics.topic_text: Do your caravans ever have trouble from bandits?
topics.response_text: Out here, we usually split our caravans into smaller bands - that way, we don't lose everything if they get hit.
A little place in the NCR called Oak Creek. Used to be a farming town until it got taken over by ranchers.
Okay, just let me know when you want to talk numbers.

description:
Blake is a 38 year-old African American Male.

Blake is a middle-aged man with a weathered face and calloused hands, a testament to his farming background. He stands at an average height with a sturdy build, having spent years working the land. His eyes are sharp and observant, constantly assessing his surroundings and potential business opportunities. He dresses practically in worn-out caravan company attire, with a well-maintained revolver holstered at his hip for protection on the dangerous roads of the Mojave Wasteland.

Blake's Personality: Blake is pragmatic and resourceful, having learned to navigate the complexities of the wasteland through years of experience. He values efficiency and reliability in both business and personal interactions. While he maintains a professional demeanor, he occasionally reveals a dry wit and a hint of nostalgia for his simpler past. He is not one to trust easily, having been burned by both business partners and acquaintances in the past.

Blake's Backstory: Born and raised in Oak Creek, a farming town within the New California Republic, Blake witnessed the town's gradual transformation from a community of independent farmers to one controlled by powerful ranchers. As a young man, he refused to be confined to a life of brahmin herding and decided to seek his fortune elsewhere. After several years of odd jobs and traveling, he joined the Crimson Caravan Company, recognizing the potential for steady income and opportunities for advancement. Through hard work and a keen eye for supply and demand, Blake earned the position of supply manager for the company's branch near New Vegas, a role he has held for the past few years.
